cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.7)
project(dcm2itk_deps VERSION 0.2.4)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON) 
set(CMAKE_CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)

SET(ZLIB_COMPAT ON)
SET(ZLIB_ENABLE_TESTS OFF)
add_subdirectory(zlib-ng)

SET(ZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/zlib-ng;${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/zlib-ng")
SET(ZLIB_LIBRARY_DEBUG "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/zlib-ng/Debug/zlibstaticd.lib")
SET(ZLIB_LIBRARY_RELEASE "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/zlib-ng/Release/zlibstatic.lib")


SET(ITK_BUILD_DEFAULT_MODULES OFF CACHE BOOL "Disable")
SET(ITK_DYNAMIC_LOADING OFF CACHE BOOL "Disable")
SET(ITK_USE_SYSTEM_ZLIB ON CACHE BOOL "Enable")
SET(ITK_DOXYGEN_HTML OFF)
SET(BUILD_TESTING OFF)
SET(HDF5_TEST_CPP OFF)
SET(HDF5_TEST_EXAMPLES OFF)
SET(HDF5_TEST_FORTRAN OFF)
SET(HDF5_TEST_JAVA OFF)
SET(HDF5_TEST_PARALLEL OFF)
SET(HDF5_TEST_SERIAL OFF)
SET(HDF5_TEST_SWMR OFF)
SET(HDF5_TEST_TOOLS OFF)
add_subdirectory(ITK)
